org.eclipse.dataset.roi

Class ROISliceUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.dataset.roi.ROISliceUtils

  • public class ROISliceUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class with utils methods for slicing 3D datasets with ROIs

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ROISliceUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int findPositionOfClosestValueInAxis(IDataset dataset, java.lang.Double val)
      Method to find the index of matching the value closest to val in the dataset
      static IDataset getAxisDatasetTrapzSum(ILazyDataset lz, IDataset axis, RectangularROI roi, Slice[] slices, int dim, int step, IMonitor monitor)
      Method to get trapezium integration corresponding to the area selected by an x-axis range roi
      Only for ROIs on 1D plots, along the dimension dim of the lazy dataset.
      static IDataset getAxisDatasetTrapzSumBaselined(ILazyDataset lz, IDataset axis, RectangularROI roi, Slice[] slices, int dim, int step, boolean baseline, IMonitor monitor)
      Method to trapezium integration minus linear baseline corresponding to the region selected by an x-axis range roi
      Only for ROIs on 1D plots, along the dimension dim of the lazy dataset.
      static IDataset getDataset(ILazyDataset lz, LinearROI roi, Slice[] slices, int[] order, int step, IMonitor monitor)
      Method to slice a dataset using an roi to define the sliced range
      Order must be at least 2 ints long and defines the x,y slice dimensions
      static IDataset getDataset(ILazyDataset lz, RectangularROI roi, Slice[] slices, int[] order, int step, IMonitor monitor)
      Method to slice a dataset using an roi to define the sliced range
      Order must be at least 2 ints long and defines the x,y slice dimensions
      static Slice getSliceFromRectangularXAxis1D(RectangularROI roi, IDataset axis, int step)
      Method to return the slice corresponding to the area selected by an x-axis range roi
      Only for ROIs on 1D plots.
      static Slice[] getSlicesFromRectangularROI(RectangularROI roi, int step)
      Method to get x,y slices from a rectangular roi
      If length of roi is less than 1, slice of width 1 is returned
      static IDataset getTrapiziumArea(ILazyDataset lz, IDataset axis, RectangularROI roi, Slice[] slices, int dim, int step, IMonitor monitor)
      Method to get trapezium area corresponding to the region selected by an x-axis range roi (start-end)
      Only for ROIs on 1D plots, along the dimension dim of the lazy dataset.
      static IDataset getYAxisDataset2D(ILazyDataset lz, RectangularROI roi, Slice[] slices, int dim, IMonitor monitor)
      Method to return the dataset corresponding to the area selected by an y-axis range roi
      Only for ROIs on 1D plots.
      static IDataset getYAxisDataset2DAverage(ILazyDataset lz, RectangularROI roi, Slice[] slices, int dim, IMonitor monitor)
      Method to return the dataset corresponding to the area selected by an y-axis range roi
      Only for ROIs on 1D plots.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
